com.gl.vn.me.ko.pies.platform.server.rest

Class JsonRestServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gl.vn.me.ko.pies.platform.server.tcp.TcpServer
      • com.gl.vn.me.ko.pies.platform.server.rest.RestServer<JsonRestRequestHandlerResult>
        • com.gl.vn.me.ko.pies.platform.server.rest.JsonRestServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    @ThreadSafe
public final class JsonRestServer
extends RestServer<JsonRestRequestHandlerResult>
    A RestServer that responds by using JSON only.

    HTTP responses MAY specify HTTP reason phrase in the following format (see JSON_RESPONSE_REASON_PHRASE_NVNAME): 

    
 {
        "httpReasonPhrase": "a reason phrase"
 }

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String JSON_RESPONSE_REASON_PHRASE_NVNAME
      Name of a name-value JSON pair that specifies an HTTP reason phrase.

    • Method Detail

      • createServiceHttpResponse

        protected final FullHttpResponse createServiceHttpResponse(HttpResponseStatus httpResponseStatus,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           String httpReasonPhrase)
        Description copied from class: RestServer
        Creates a new HTTP response that will be used by RestServer when there is no RestRequestHandlerResult available.

        Subclasses MAY override this method. This method MUST support concurrent invocations. Version of the returned HTTP response MUST be HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1.

        Default implementation in RestServer constructs the simplest HTTP response with "Content-Type" "text/plain" and Constant.CHARSET Charset.

        Overrides:
        createServiceHttpResponse in class RestServer<JsonRestRequestHandlerResult>
        Parameters:
        httpResponseStatus - An HTTP status code.
        httpReasonPhrase - An HTTP reason phrase.
        Returns:
        A new HTTP response.
